synopsis.text:
University of the Arts, Tokyo graduate Tomoki Misato presents a gripping tale of courage and survival in the face of danger. A mother goat, determined to save her young ones from the clutches of a menacing wolf, successfully rescues her little goats from the predator's belly. However, her eldest son Toruku remains unaccounted for, leaving the mother goat in a state of distress and uncertainty.

Just when all hope seems lost, Toruku returns home, only to be confronted with the harsh reality of his siblings' disfigured bodies. As the wolf threatens to strike again, Toruku must face his fears head-on and reveal the truth behind his mysterious disappearance. With the fate of the entire flock hanging in the balance, they must band together and fight for their survival in this intense and emotionally charged anime.
